nodes.text: The Ranger was a model of hoverbike produced by Vectron during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. The driver rode at the front of the Ranger, which had engine flaps that could move up and down.

The Vectron Ranger was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic on July 22, 2015 as one of the items in the Outer Rim Explorer's Pack on the Cartel Market. It is one of the first vehicles to feature a "flourish;" in the Ranger's case, the engine flaps move up and down.
